  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_439</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Celosías</string>
            <string language="en">Lattices</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gitter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trellis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lattices</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Grate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δικτυωτά πλέγματα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de isometría. Se utilizan, para estudiar los diferentes conceptos, ejemplos de celosías arquitectónicas. Se utiliza también el concepto de isomorfismo.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of isometry, using architectural latticework to study the different concepts involved. The concept of isomorphism is also used.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">grupo</string>
            <string language="en">group</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">isomorfismo</string>
            <string language="en">isomorphism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">celosía</string>
            <string language="en">lattice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">isometría</string>
            <string language="en">isometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept von isometry zu erklären mit 
architektonischem latticework, die unterschiedlichen Konzepte zu 
studieren betroffen. Das Konzept von Isomorphismus wird auch 
verwendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le concept d'isometry, en utilisant le 
latticework architectural pour étudier les différents concepts 
impliqués. Le concept de l'isomorphisme est également 
utilisé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar o
conceito de isometry, usando o latticework architectural estudar os 
conceitos diferentes envolvidos. O conceito do isomorphism é 
usado também.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni spiegare
il concetto di isometry, usando latticework architettonico per 
studiare i concetti differenti in questione. Il concetto 
dell'isomorfismo egualmente è usato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις 
προσομοιώσεις για να εξηγήσει την έννοια isometry, 
χρησιμοποιώντας το αρχιτεκτονικό συρματόπλεγμα για να μελετήσει 
τις διαφορετικές έννοιες περιέλαβε. Η έννοια του 
ισομορφισμού χρησιμοποιείται επίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gruppe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Isomorphismus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gitter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">isometry</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
